_header: Fulfilled is the prophecy for aye
_description: ‘The bisson ledys the blynde’ (on the Abuses of the Age) — ten 8-line stanzas

BLHar5396.First Lines: ffulfyllyd ys þe prosey for ayþat merlyn sayd & many on mo…
BLHar5396.Last Lines: …þat we may wynne þe heuynly tourffor here þe bysom ledys þe blynde
BLHar5396.Note:
Wrongly listed as in Harley 5369 in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943.
BLHar5396.Attributed Title: The bysoun ledys the blynde (added to upper margin by a later hand, f. 295)
